name: CenteredVersorTransformInitializer
filter_type: itk::CenteredVersorTransformInitializer< itk::AffineTransform< double, TImageType::ImageDimension  >, TImageType, TImageType>

inputs.name: Transform

members.name: ComputeRotation
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Enable the use of the principal axes of each image to compute an initial rotation that will align them.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Enable the use of the principal axes of each image to compute an initial rotation that will align them.

briefdescription: CenteredVersorTransformInitializeris a helper class intended to initialize the center of rotation, versor, and translation of the VersorRigid3DTransform.
detaileddescription: This class derived from the CenteredTransformInitializerand uses it in a more constrained context. It always uses the Moments mode, and also takes advantage of the second order moments in order to initialize the Versorrepresenting rotation.
